sys_element_mapping.value:
Approval needed for leave by:

Name: Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Requested By➛Name

Hi Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Requested By➛First name.

Your leave request has been approved.

 

Leave Details:

Leave type: Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Leave type

Duration: Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Duration

Start date: Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛Start Date

End date: Trigger➛Leave Request Record➛End Date

 

Thank you.
